name: Draw a Stickman: EPIC 2
description: Imagination is the key, as you enter a magical storybook full of mystery and wonder, unusual creatures, and enigmatic puzzles! Create your own original Stickman and then watch it come to life in DRAW A STICKMAN: EPIC 2! Jump in to this action-packed adventure that allows for endless creativity!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: Dual-core processor (SSE2 instruction set support.) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound cards

reviews.review_text: Very fun and a good puzzle game. But I have to ask, what happens to your friend? XD
Love it.. Pretty good game for kids who don't like gory games..
Fun little story about a stickman trying to save his friend.

This game is really fun game I %100 recomend this game. This gam is also easy and perfect for younger kids. I only wish there was more levels in the game or even a community level thing where you can make a level or play another players level.

This game is a fun adventure that gravitates around the player's cryativity. It is obviously designed for children, but i need to say that i got some entertainment out of it. the big problem is the price. I SINCERELY cannot say its worth the default price. But, i feel like its worth it when its on a sale. It's worth a shot, and we have Steam Refund if something goes wrong.
A brilliant game where I made me and pacman and you can make you [or anyone} but I do not want to spoil the game for you. So get it yourself.
Going into the game. Drawing myself and my friend as 2 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥. They are starting to move and talk. Game Transfers to 'Drawing Leaves Simulator'. 11/10

This game is amazing first time I played :D  It's so cool! When you make a stick person you don't have to do a stick figure you can do what is in your imagonation :D I rate this 120000/5 I recommend this game to everyone by every age :D

I don't get the *EPIC* part in the game title (please make a 3rd version) but this drawing/puzzle/adventure game is so phenomenal and expressive, the fact where you get different pencils for different parts in this game is so cool (i mostly like the pic and sword stuff in this game) the fact where you can create your imagination in colors, it's so cool.
